eus.julenugalde.mvcnotepad.view

Interface TextView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwingView

    public interface TextView
    Interface that specifies the methods to be implemented for the MVC Notepad view

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • chooseDataSource

        java.lang.String chooseDataSource(java.lang.String defaultDataSource,
                                  int modifier)
        Shows a choose prompt to select a source to be read or writen. To be used when the view implementation allows listing the data sources from a location, e.g. list the files in a directory
        Parameters:
        defaultDataSource - Initial location of the source for reading operations, full path for writing
        modifier - TextView.READ indicates that the data source will be read; TextView.WRITE means that the source will be written.
        Returns:
        String with the full path of the chosen source, null if the operation had errors or was cancelled by the user.

      • chooseDataSource

        java.lang.String chooseDataSource(java.lang.String[] availableSources,
                                  int modifier)
        Shows a choose prompt to select a source to be read or writen. To be used when the view implementation cannot list the data sources from a location, e.g. access a database
        Parameters:
        availableSources - List of sources for reading operations, name of the source to be writen for writing operation
        modifier - TextView.READ indicates that the data source will be read; TextView.WRITE means that the source will be written.
        Returns:
        String with the name of the chosen source, null if the operation had errors or was cancelled by the user.

      • showPrompt

        int showPrompt(java.lang.String title,
               java.lang.String message)
        Shows a prompt to the user. The possible answers are yes, no and cancel.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the prompt
        message - Question asked to the user
        Returns:
        int value with the answer to the question. Can be TextView.YES_OPTION if the answer was yes, TextView.NO_OPTION if the answer was no, or TextView.CANCEL_OPTION if the user selected cancel or closed the prompt.

      • displayText

        void displayText(java.lang.String text)
        Replace the text currently in the editor by the one passed as an argument
        Parameters:
        text - String to be displayed

      • deleteText

        void deleteText()
        Delete all the text currently displayed in the editor

      • setTextFont

        void setTextFont(java.lang.String fontName,
                 int fontSize)
        Set the font for displaying the text
        Parameters:
        fontName - String font name
        fontSize - font size in points

      • toggleColors

        void toggleColors()
        Invert the colors for the text edition area.

      • getCurrentText

        java.lang.String getCurrentText()
        Read the text currently in the text editor
        Returns:
        String with the content of the text area

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Show some text in the application's notification area
        Parameters:
        status - Text to be displayed

      • appendText

        void appendText(java.lang.String text)
        Append a string to the text currently in the editor
        Parameters:
        text - String to be appended to the end of the text

      • toggleStatusBar

        void toggleStatusBar()
        Show or hide the application's notificaton area

      • showTextInputDialog

        java.lang.String showTextInputDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String message,
                                     java.lang.String defaultText)
        Displays a prompt to ask the user for a text.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the prompt to be displayed.
        message - Message for the prompt.
        defaultText - String with the default text.
        Returns:
        String entered by the user. null if the operation is cancelled.

      • showPopupMessage

        void showPopupMessage(java.lang.String title,
                      java.lang.String message)
        Show a custom message to the user
        Parameters:
        title - String with the message title
        message - String with the message to be displayed

        Show anerror message to the user
        Parameters:

        error - String with the error message to be displayed

      • cutText

        java.lang.String cutText()
        Remove the selected text from the text area and return it
        Returns:
        String corresponding to the text area selection

        Copy the selected text from the text area (without removing it) and return it
        Returns:
        String corresponding to the text area selection

      • pasteText

        void pasteText(java.lang.String text)
        Insert the text at the caret location
        Parameters:
        text - String to be inserted at the caret position

      • isTextBold

        boolean isTextBold()
        Flag indicating if the text is currently bold
        Returns:
        true if the text is bold, false otherwise

      • isTextItalic

        boolean isTextItalic()
        Flag indicating if the text is currently in italics
        Returns:
        true if the text is in italics, false otherwise

      • setTextBold

        void setTextBold(boolean flag)
        Sets the current text style in bold or removes this style
        Parameters:
        flag - true to set the text bold, false to remove the bold style

      • setTextItalic

        void setTextItalic(boolean flag)
        Sets the current text style in italics or removes this style
        Parameters:
        flag - true to set the text in italics, false to remove the italics style

      • toggleWordWrap

        void toggleWordWrap()
        Alternates the word wrap feature between on and off

        Updates the font family used in the text area

      • updateFontSize

        void updateFontSize()
        Updates the font sized used in the text area

      • setCaretPosition

        void setCaretPosition(int position)
        Places the caret in the specified location
        Parameters:
        position - New position of the caret. If it exceeds the length of the text area content, it will be placed at the end.

      • closeView

        void closeView()
        Closes the view
